short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An efficient and easy-to-use Markdown editor, and sharing tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A WYSIWYG markdown editor that interacts with local files through the Chrome file system and has built-in network functions. You can generate document content as a knowledge site with one click.
